physical_appearance:\The image shows a digital print
 an artist\u0027s proof
 and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist\u0027s proof are purple in colour. The images depict a worker standing at the top of a wooden ramp. The worker is wearing a pink shirt and adorns a brown hat. Two pails are suspended from a shoulder yoke that is being carried by the worker.The background of the images depict the cloudless blue sky as well. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. \\Tough Job\\ is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. \\Tan Lip Seng
